long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PopBRC - PLAY THE 1ST “PROOF OF PLAY” GAME ON X.COM

  + Playing PopBRC game on X.com
  + Doing daily task to have change claim reward

To complete a daily task, simply locate the gift icon on the X news feed page and click on it.
Then respond with any text that includes the hashtag '#popbrc'.
Finally, click the “Open” button to finish the quest.
